title: 斐波那契数 (Fibonacci Number)
content: 思路: // @Title: 斐波那契数 (Fibonacci Number) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-22 22:29:21 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 39.3 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int fib(int n) { if(n<2){return n;} int[] dp=new int[n+1]; dp[0]=0; dp[1]=1; for(int i=2;i<=n;i++){ dp[i]=dp[i-1]+dp[i-2]; } return dp[n]; } }
